overview_of_class: This course embraces all major literary works of the 10th century to the 17th, and substantial attention is paid to Byzantine history and literature. The course touches upon various genres: Epic (from the oral ballads to Slovo o polku Igoreve); hagiography (lives [biographies] of the saints); chronicles (from Povest' vremennykch let to Skazanie o Mamaevom poboishche); autobiography (Zhitie protopopa Avvakuma); epistolary (from Pouchenie Vladimira Monomakcha to the letters of Ivan the Terrible to Prince Kurbsky) et al.
name: Studies in Old Russian Literature
subject: SLAVIC
